textContent:
---TT---

I cried last week because I missed you so much!! Wala lang hahaha. Ang cute!!! HAAHAHHA and wholesome, and sweet!! The past me never thought that I would ever cry for someone just because miss ko lang sila ng sobra, pero wala. Malakas masyado tama ko sayo bby HAHAH Sorry na HAHAHAHA

Truth be told though, I miss you every day. And my level of missing you only grows stronger each and every time. The fact that I get to spend more time with only makes me more aware of the times that I am not with you. Of course, spending time with you is always a good thing. But the pangungulila is of course, a lot more worse HUHUHU.

I really cannot wait for the day where we start spending everyday together Rei. I love you so much!

---TT 2---

Tas kahapon naman bby (and the day before), ikaw umiyak HUHUHU. Sorry bby! I never want to be the reason for your tears pero I understand naman na its inevitable talaga huhuhu. Pero still, I'll keep trying my best so that you won't cry because of me huhuhu. I'm really sorry that you felt unwanted nung pumunta ako sa inyo just because nahihiya ako huhuhu. I really promise I'll make it up to you!!! I don't want you to feel that way again kase I want to show you just how much I love you every time!
title: April 3, 2024
textContentHtml:
---TT---

The fact that I get to spend more time with only makes me more aware of the times that I am not with you. Of course, spending time with you is always a good thing. But the pangungulila is of course, a lot more worse HUHUHU.


I really cannot wait for the day where we start spending everyday together Rei. I love you so much!

Pero still, I'll keep trying my best so that you won't cry because of me huhuhu. I'm really sorry that you felt unwanted nung pumunta ako sa inyo just because nahihiya ako huhuhu.
